div1.head: Introduction
div1.p: This document describes the URI &nsname; that identifies the Unicode Codepoint Collation of the specification (March 2017 version). This URI identifies a collation (not a namespace) and is not associated with an XML Schema. For updated information, please refer to the latest version of the specification.
The Unicode Codepoint Collation is not to be confused with the Unicode Collation Algorithm.
This document contains a directory of links to related resources, using RDDL (as defined in ).
It is GRDDL-enabled (as defined in ), that is to say that a GRDDL-compliant processor can extract useful RDF (as defined in ) representations of the information contained herein.

div1.head: Collations
div1.p: The Unicode Codepoint collation provides the ability to compare strings based on code point values. Every implementation of XPath 2.0 and higher, and every implementation of XQuery 1.0 and higher, must support this collation.

div1.head: Normative References

bibl.key: XPath and XQuery Functions and Operators 3.1

div1.p:
This document specifies the Unicode Codepoint Collation.
is the only specification that is permitted to amend this namespace.
